title: The Standard Model a la Connes-Lott
abstract: The relations among coupling constants and masses in the standard model \`a la Connes-Lott with general scalar product are computed in detail. We find a relation between the top and the Higgs masses. For $m_t=174\pm22\ GeV$ it yields $m_H=277\pm40\ GeV$. The Connes-Lott theory privileges the masses $m_t=160.4\ GeV$ and $m_H=251.8\ GeV$.
